title: The Shimamoto
alternative_title: Kazuhiko Shimamoto Early Short Stories: The Shimamoto ; Kazuhiko Shimamoto Oneshot Collection ; 島本和彦初期短編集　ザ・島本 (初版初刷)
status: Kazuhiko Shimamoto Early Short Stories: The Shimamoto ; Kazuhiko Shimamoto Oneshot Collection ; 島本和彦初期短編集　ザ・島本 (初版初刷)
description:
Description :
        One-shot compilation of Shimamoto's earlier works for Shogakukan:- **Blazing Transfer Student - Kaiju Battle!** (炎の転校生・怪獣戦闘!, Honoo no Tenkousei - Kaijuu Sentou!): Noboru Takizawa and crew are back for another chaotic event, this time dealing with an alien invasion. A bonus story done half a year after serialization finished.- **Warrior of the Sun Wind Breaker X** (太陽の戦士ウインドブレーカーX, Taiyou no Senshi Wind Breaker X)- **Hardly a Hero** (ほとんどヒーロー, Hotondo Hero)- **My Love Qualifications Are Nothing!** (恋の資格がナッシング, Koi no Shikaku ga Nothing): Shimamoto's sole shojo work, serialized in Ciao.
